segments.text: This is what my boss is expecting , Sandy . He wants a detailed list of expenses and equipment costs .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That ’ s going to take a while to put together , Paul .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The sooner , the better , Sandy . I don ’ t think he ’ ll sign anything till he ’ s got that in his hands .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ ll get to work on it right away . Anything else ?
segments.speaker: S2
